snippet.title: Glass Masquerade - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Glass Masquerade - an artistic puzzle game inspired by Art Deco & stained glass artisans of the 20th century. 
More info: https://glass-masquerade.com
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/dev/onyxlute
